#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int T;
cin>>T;
while(T--)
{
char string1[17],string2[17];
cin>>string1;
cin>>string2;
int l=strlen(string2),counter=0;
if(strcmp(string1,string2)==0)
{
    cout<<"YES\n";
    counter=31;
}
while(counter<(l-1))
{
for(int i=l; i>0; i--)
{
string2[i]=string2[i-1];
}
string2[0]=string2[l];
string2[l]='\0';
if(strcmp(string1,string2)==0)
{
cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
counter=30;
}
counter++;
}
if(counter!=31)
{
cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
}

}
}
